short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add state of workitem before the TFS link in Confluence

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add informations about the TFS WorkItem on Confluence.

It work parsing the TFS links in content page, and it's possible to use directly the tag [TFSLink-123456] (replace 123456 by your WorkItem Id)
